sentences.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī háo shēng de shuǐ.
sentences.translation: Please give me one milliliter of water.

sentences.simplifiedText: 这瓶药每次应服用十毫升。
sentences.traditionalText: 這瓶藥每次應服用十毫升。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè píng yào měi cì yīng fú yòng shí háo shēng.
sentences.translation: You should take ten milliliters of this medicine each time.
